body.name: CPCGER Magnetic Wireless Charger 15W Ultra-Fast Apple Mag-Safe Charger for iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Plus/15 Pro Max/14/13/12 Series Magnet Charging Pad with Sleep-Friendly Ligh for AirPods 3/2/Pro
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 22 mins
features: 🚀【Specifically for iPhone 15/14/13/12 Series】Magnetic Wireless Charger provides up to 15W(max) wireless fast charging for your iPhone. Mag-safe wireless charging pad is perfectly compatible with iPhone 12/13/14/15 Series, AirPods Pro /3 / 2 models and iPhone with Magnetic cases.✅Note: Please use the Mag-Safe case for stronger magnetization, regular cases will weaken the magnetic adsorption.❌ Package Not Included Charger Adapter.

🚀【Magnetic Alignment and Strong Adsorption】Mag-Safe wireless charger relies on N52 strong magnets to automatically align the magnetic phone charger to the best position and secure your phone. While your iPhone is charging, you're free to work, play games, watch movies, listen to music, or do anything else you might need to do.

🚀【15W Fast Magnetic Safe Charging】Engineer testing shows that it only takes 2 hours to charge iPhone from 0 to 100%, and it can charge iPhone 14 to 50% in half an hour, which is three times faster than the original 5W iPhone charger. Our wireless charger has passed FCC, RoHS and UL certification requirements to ensure fast magnetic and safe charging.

🚀【 5ft/1.5m Cable & USB-A/Type-C Dual Input】:The magnetic charging cradle with USB and Type-C dual charging ports saves you the hassle of replacing old adapters. Also, you don't have to worry about being too far from the power source to charge, the 5ft cable allows you to charge while using your iPhone freely on the couch or bed. Note: 15W or higher power adapter is recommended.(❌Product does not come with adapter)

🚀【LED Smart Charging Indicator】Apple wireless magnetic charger intuitively displays the charging status of the iPhone, standby input 9V: blue breathing light on (off after seconds); normal charging: blue breathing pulse; foreign object detection: blue fast flashing. The soft blue breathing light will light up for a few seconds and then turn off automatically will not disturb the rest, absolutely perfect for a bedside table magnetic safety wireless charger.

🎁【Sleek Portable & Buy with Confidence】The lightweight design makes it easy to carry and can be placed in a pocket or handbag that doesn't take up any space. If you have any problems with the magnetic wireless charger Please feel free to contact us for our professional advice.

What devices is the Magnetic Wireless Mag-Safe Charger compatible with? It is compatible with iPhone 15/14/13/12 Series, AirPods 3/2/Pro, providing seamless wireless charging. What to do if your phone gets hot？ If the launch pad overheats or the object overheats during use, please remove the charging device. Wait for it to cool down and try charging again. Does it also charge apple watch? No, just for phone and earbuds that support wireless charging. Does the charger have a light? Yes, it has LED light for convenient charging in dark spaces Are there any additional features that set this charger apart? Besides dual charging ports, it boasts a sleek design, making it a stylish and functional accessory for Apple devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snaps on solid. Charges fast enough. Light auto dims!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent design. What I like most is that the leds turn off. This is great if you’re sensitive to random lights while trying to sleep. It turns on initially to let you know it’s working but then turns off entirely so you’re not annoyed by charging lights. Works great for my 11 pro, 13 mini and 15 pro max. Strong magnet. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No need to plug it in.
reviews.reviewText: Yes, the Magnetic Wireless Charger Max is a fast wireless charger designed specifically for Apple devices, such as the iPhone 12, iPhone 13, and other models that support MagSafe technology. This charger provides a maximum power output of 15W, allowing for faster charging compared to standard wireless chargers.The Magnetic Wireless Charger Max utilizes the MagSafe feature, which uses an array of magnets to ensure proper alignment and secure attachment to your iPhone. This magnetic connection not only provides convenience but also allows for more efficient charging by maximizing the transfer of power between the charger and your device.With a 15W power output, the Magnetic Wireless Charger Max can deliver faster charging speeds, allowing you to quickly recharge your iPhone's battery. However, it's worth noting that the actual charging speed may vary depending on various factors, such as the battery level, device temperature, and usage while charging.To use the Magnetic Wireless Charger Max, you simply need to align the charger's magnetic connector with the corresponding MagSafe alignment on your iPhone. Once properly attached, charging will begin automatically. Additionally, the Magnetic Wireless Charger Max supports charging other Qi-enabled devices, although it may not provide the same fast charging speeds as with MagSafe-compatible iPhones.It's important to ensure that your iPhone or other devices are compatible with MagSafe technology before using the Magnetic Wireless Charger Max to ensure optimal charging performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Like many others, I was looking for one or more wireless chargers to place in heavily used areas around my home. I ordered a pack of four from another source, and the USB-C/USB-C adapter totally came apart when trying to separate. I still liked the concept and decided to order this 2-pack. I've not been disappointed. I've owned these now for about four months, and they appear to be doing exactly what they're supposed to do. These are not as fast as wired, of course, but charging completes in a reasonable amount of time. Hopefully, they won't diminish my iPhone 13+ battery level considerably as I have heard this can occur. If I purchase more of this type wireless charger, I'm hopeful a newer model will have a cable that detaches from the charging base. Great product(s) at a great price!
